snippet: The replica throne is made not from molten steel but from hand-finished, hand-painted fiberglass and fireproof resin and weighs 350 pounds.
abstract: The replica throne is made not from molten steel but from hand-finished, hand-painted fiberglass and fireproof resin and weighs 350 pounds.

headline.main: In 'Game of Thrones,' You Win or You Buy: HBO Offers $30,000 Iron Throne Replicas
headline.print_headline: Game of Cashing In: A $30,000 TV Throne
